```json
{
  "verdict": 9,
  "Explanation": [
    "URL uses http",
    "vercel.app is a medium-risk TLD (often used for legitimate projects, but also for quick scam setups)",
    "Suspicious subdomain: Includes 'fb-ads' (potential brand impersonation of Facebook) and a long string of numbers, suggesting a temporary or automatically generated URL.",
    "The structure of the URL is designed to attract Facebook users who might click the link believing they are interacting with Facebook regarding their ads."
  ]
}
```
